title: When is the best time to write backlog exams may or July ?

comments.body: Whenever you think you'll be best prepared. They aren't going to go easy and pass you just because this is a backlog, they don't owe you that. So you're going to have to study and prepare for it like the real thing. If you think you need more time, register for it during July. Or if you'd rather get done with it, May.

Minimum marks to pass is 40 , some say 35. If you think you have prepared for atleast crossing 40+,go for that iteration. There wont be any sort of relative grading no matter how difficult the paper is. So prepare for atleast crossing 40+.
